data.actual_result: No button which allows you to transfer ownership of your server
data.expected_result: Transfer Ownership button is found and you can transfer ownership
data.short_description: No option to transfer ownership in new Server Settings menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server in which you're the owner, with at least one other member - Open the server settings menu and go to the Members list - Click on the options menu for the non-owner member and try to find the Transfer Ownership button
